author: RTÉ News
title: COVID-19: US facing toughest week- surgeon general
description: The United States is entering what a senior official warned would be the "hardest" week of the coronavirus crisis.
content:
The United States is entering what a senior official warned  would be the "hardest" week of the coronavirus crisis.
With health authorities recording 1,200 new deaths from the virus in a 24 hour period, the Surgeon General, Jerome Adams, said the country is … [+1999 chars]
